This course will help new Facebook advertisers effectively create, place, and manage their Facebook ads. Author Brad Batesole takes you through the basics: setting up an account, understanding ad structure, and using the Ads Create and the Ads Manager tools. Finally, Brad will leave you with some tips for writing great ads, choosing effective images, and improving ad performance.
